channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: Graylog vs Loki - Choosing the Right Log Management Tool
item.description: Compare Graylog and Loki for log management. Learn key differences, use cases, and how to choose the best tool for your needs.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Graylog vs. Splunk - The Ultimate Log Management Showdown
item.description: Explore the key differences between Graylog and Splunk, two powerful log management tools, to determine the best fit for your organization.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)
